about.about: BMF is one of the first Digital Investment Foundations, and is a leader within CryptoCurrencies and Blockchain investments. Our mission is to act as the catalyst for widespread Blockchain adoption and innovation, and to allow citizens of this planet to control their own monetary funds.<hr>Founded in October of 2017, BMF is a financial foundation which hosts a digital wallet and investment platform for its clients, while being backed by the new Bitcoin payment protocol.<hr>Within the next several years, BMF envisions Blockchains and digital currencies having an established, responsibly managed, and regulated role within the global economy, as government-backed Currencies will begin to dismantle.
